title: A graphical user interface for novel software that expedites drug discovery by providing experimentally-determined 3D structures of free ligands.
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: Project was successful and the outputs were successfully used to spin-out C4XDiscovery Ltd now a company listed on the London stock exchange. Project was successful and the outputs were successfully used to spin-out C4XDiscovery Ltd now a company listed on the London stock exchange. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
